lead_paragraph: The London mayor's preferred plan for a new airport is likely to fall flat, because it would force relocation of one of Europe's biggest liquefied natural gas terminals at a time when Britain relies ever more on overseas gas.

headline.main: Analysis: Gas, Power Hub to Trump London's Top Airport Project
headline.print_headline: Analysis: Gas, Power Hub to Trump London's Top Airport Project

snippet: The London mayor's preferred plan for a new airport is likely to fall flat, because it would force relocation of one of Europe's biggest liquefied natural gas terminals at a time when Britain relies ever more on overseas gas....
